description: Try our easy to follow Pork Katsu With Coconut Rice recipe. Absolutely delicious with the best ingredients from Woolworths.
name: Pork Katsu With Coconut Rice Recipe | Woolworths

recipeInstructions.text: Drizzle pork with tonkatsu sauce and serve with coconut rice and a spinach sesame salad. Garnish with remaining coconut.
